summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2928, for the improvement of 28th Avenue Northeast from East 55th Street to East 60th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, providing for the necessary surface drainage and by the construction of concrete walks, under Ordinance No. 35372 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
